TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Yes, and a thinner version is spaghettister

Is there a thinner version of that?

Yes. Angel Hair.

How do I get a computer system that could run KSP 2 if I don't have any money?

You run it with your... respiratory system! Now that's stupid.

Will I ever finish writing the whole story of the three word story thread?

Spoiler

For real, I'm doing it right now. And I'm just at page 10! You might not believe that it had more than 99 pages.

As it never ends, probably not.

Have you read the original "Never Ending Story"?

Spoiler

It eventually ends.

No, I never red the original story that never ended but eventually did.

Are you interested in reading the stupid story of the whole three word story?

Nope.  tldr.

Why aren't there more Kerbal memes?

Because Kerbals are dead already.

Do you wanna go to Dres even though it doesn't exist?

Yes, i want to go to empty space!

If 1 is 2, then 1 + I = 3?

In theory, an apple is red. (now that's really stupid)

If Newton discovered gravity, then Oldton discovered anti-gravity?

Yes, when the apple had bounced off his head.

If Newton was sitting under a pear, would the gravity be excentric?

No. Newton noticed gravity while Oldton in the Anti Universe noticed anti-gravity.

(If Newton had discovered gravity then everything would have floated away long before he was born. Yes I am aware that that sounds like I am saying invented, but what I mean is that gravity has been having a direct affect on everything since the planet solidified. Where as discovered things have to have been discovered by humans actively looking around for things that are not immediately obvious.)

Ninja'd by Kerbiloid, I should have known I put too much thought into that.

If Newton was sitting under a pear, would the gravity be excentric?

Yes, that is why the world is slightly pear shaped.

If an apple falls in a forest, does anybody pear?

Edited January 19, 2022 by ColdJ

If Apple falls, NASDAQ will.

"prince" - "princess", "duke" - "duchess"
What's the male parallel to the "chess"?
The king. We're talking about chess, right?

I believe so.

Was Chester the right answer?
Possibly.
As duke → duchess, probably it's Ke.
Ke

Why do they never play chess poker?
The combinations are same, just the pawns are excessive. But they can be bets.

Because the pieces catch fire or melt when you use them to turn the logs in the fireplace.

Would you play Kerbal Sub Program if there was a rich undersea world and loads of places to explore all over Kerbin?

Of course. I still can't see, who needs that empty, useless space.

In the coin poker, are the five coin "heads" a flush or a straight?

A flaight.

 

Are kerbals plants or animals?

Edited January 21, 2022 by Akagi

They are a seafood escaping to space.

What was earlier: Kraken or Kerbals?

Kerbraken! they are one species, but they have two appearances. a kerbal is an immature kraken.

 

Why do my SSTOs becomes SSTOceans?

Because it easier to  get to the ocean.

Why don't Kerbals play chess?

Don't they?

Spoiler

 

Also, Kerbals better play checkers, as they are equal, but some equals are more orange than others.

 

What if play chess with cards?
